function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper COVID-19 medical staff training","Impact":"Increased risk of mishandling COVID-19 cases and further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Provide virtual reality training to medical staff to increase familiarity with actual cases and effective handling","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology for simulating complex medical scenarios","People":"Healthcare workers, physicians","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, medical training organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate patient education","Impact":"Decreased patient satisfaction and understanding of medical procedures","Mitigation":"Implement virtual reality approaches to educate patients and enhance satisfaction","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology for patient education","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, medical education providers"},{"Description":"Ineffective mental and psychological treatment","Impact":"Failure to address psychosomatic disturbances and psychological issues among patients","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual reality methodology for mental and psychological treatment","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology for psychological therapy","People":"Patients with psychosomatic disturbances","Owner":"Mental health institutions, healthcare providers"}]}
